attributes.action: Launch a government led inquiry into the grooming abuse scandal
attributes.additional_details: Children need to be protected at all costs and the government are failing to protect them.
attributes.background: The government has so far rejected any investigation into the grooming scandal. We deserve to know the truth and scale of this problem

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
